text:
Plecto (http://www.plecto.com) • ONSITE & REMOTE (EU) • Back-end Developer • Full-time

Help us create a fun working environment for sales people around the world. We are building a dashboard and gamification platform that allows sales people to keep track of their performance as if it was a sports game.

We're working with AWS, DynamoDB, Elastic Search, Python and Django. If you're keen on working with those technologies, we would love to hear from you.

Just mail me at kristian@plecto.com or read more here: https://www.plecto.com/en/jobs/

We're also happy to take interns on top of the position above.
